title: Rhesus Monkeys Are Able to Perceive Their Own Heartbeats: Study
description: Get latest articles and stories on Science at LatestLY. A new research has found that rhesus macaques are able to perceive their own heartbeats. Science News | Rhesus Monkeys Are Able to Perceive Their Own Heartbeats: Study.
content:
Mumbai (Maharashtra) [India], April 17 (ANI): A new research has found that rhesus macaques are able to perceive their own heartbeats.
The research was published in the journal, 'Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences'.

title: Coronavirus infection: Omicron variant likely to cause upper airways infection in kids, finds study
description: A study has found a strong link between the occurrence of pediatric upper airways infection during the Omicron surge. Young children are especially vulnerable to upper airways infection given their small and relatively collapsible airways, says the study published in JAMA Pediatrics on April 15, 2022.
